H0.text: What name was collectively given to the sons of Poseidon, who dwelt with him at the bottom of the sea. Nereids

H1.text: What name was collectively given to the sons of Poseidon, who dwelt with him at the bottom of the sea. Telchines

H2.text: What name was collectively given to the sons of Poseidon, who dwelt with him at the bottom of the sea. Cyclopes

H3.text: What name was collectively given to the sons of Poseidon, who dwelt with him at the bottom of the sea. Triton

A4.text: In some accounts, Poseidon was described as the Telchines' father.
